item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 2, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Corporation for Public Broadcasting Statement Regarding Executive Order (161 points | 113 comments)
2. Apple App Store guidelines remove ban on encouraging external payments in US (240 points | 141 comments)
3. How to live an intellectually rich life (104 points | 49 comments)

6. Converting a Git repo from tabs to spaces (2016) (15 points | 23 comments)
7. Altair at 50: Remembering the first Personal Computer (40 points | 12 comments)
8. Irish privacy watchdog hits TikTok with Є530M fine over data transfers to China (200 points | 119 comments)
9. Just redesigned my personal site with a TTY-style interface (111 points | 51 comments)
10. RustAssistant: Using LLMs to Fix Compilation Errors in Rust Code (90 points | 53 comments)
11. Bloom Filters (119 points | 37 comments)
12. Claude Integrations (633 points | 229 comments)
13. Don't watermark your legal PDFs with purple dragons in suits (82 points | 68 comments)
14. Redis is open source again (1690 points | 640 comments)
15. Webflow makes GSAP 100% free – plus more updates (20 points | 3 comments)
16. Crawlers impact the operations of the Wikimedia projects (40 points | 26 comments)

22. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (May 2025) (212 points | 229 comments)
23. Mathematician solves algebra's oldest problem using intriguing number sequences (17 points | 7 comments)
24. New species of methane-producing archaea discovered in the human gut (27 points | 1 comment)
25. Owen Le Blanc: creator of the first Linux distribution (103 points | 18 comments)
26. Reflecting on a Year of Gamedev in Zig (81 points | 70 comments)
27. Felix86: Run x86-64 programs on RISC-V Linux (102 points | 25 comments)
28. Clair Obscur may have the highest Metacritic user score of all time (3 points | 2 comments)
29. Anubis saved our websites from a DDoS attack (309 points | 225 comments)
30. LLMs for Engineering: Teaching Models to Design High Powered Rockets (99 points | 31 comments)
